column4: alonea: I agree.  I started with kubuntu but switched to ubuntu for that reason.  I do prefer KDE, but I'm getting used to Gnome now.  Not that that helps your problem, heh.
I didn't like gnome much on gentoo
I think i am just going to give up trying to install beryl
well, its getting to be too much trouble. I really wanted to try it, but if its this hard then I got better things to do.
